duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform various maintenance duties requiring technical labor skills, appliance repair, groundskeeping, and more.
Work as a team participant to ensure the community meets the quality maintenance standards.
Maintain clean, safe, and appealing property; communicate daily appointments and required work.
Report maintenance concerns directly to management and perform repairs; conduct irrigation systems repairs.
Keep grounds and common areas free from trash and debris; mow, weed, edge, and maintain common areas and vacant lot grounds.
Monitor and control maintenance inventory and supplies; perform other miscellaneous duties as assigned.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or the equivalent experience; 1-3 years of direct technical work experience in applicable areas; valid driver’s license, good driving record, and current auto insurance.
